turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order a large iced caramel coffee from Starbucks for me? And also order 3 pizzas for lunch?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to order the pizzas from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Dominos, whichever location is closest

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. What kind of pizza do you want to oder and for what time? I can order online for pick-up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order 2 large pepperoni, hand tossed crust but make one of those with the garlic sauce instead of tomato sauce. Also get 1 large hand tossed meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to check if they have any specials going on right now first?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. That would be great if they do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a carryout special for 2 large 2 topping pizzas for $5.99. Do you want me to get that and add the meat lovers or get 4 and change the meat lovers to something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For that price we can get 4 pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. So, 4 large pizzas. What do you want for the other two? You have 1 large hand tossed pepperoni with regular sauce and 1 large hand tossed pepperoni with garlic sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, those two are right. Make 1 the buffalo chicken and the other one cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of crust do you want for those two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make them all hand tossed crust with the garlic butter seasoning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. We have 1 large pepperoni, hand tossed, tomato sauce with garlic butter seasoning; 1 large pepperoni, hand tossed, creamy garlic sauce with the garlic butter crust seasoning; 1 large buffalo chicken, hand tossed and 1 large hand tossed cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, that sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sides, extra sauces, desserts or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't think so. 4 pizzas is enough. Oh, actually get 2 2-Liter bottles of Orange Crush. What is the damage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They don't have orange crush. They have orange Fanta, Coke, Diet Coke or Sprite. Do you want one of these instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess 1 Fanta and 1 Coke 2-liter bottles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. All done. The total is $32.89. Do you want to add a tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Add a 20% tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total is $39.47. The order is in and complete. I will send the receipt via text to you on your cell. It will be ready to pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
